00006 string YardCarrierType::ToString(const string& delim, bool quotes) const {
00007     
00008     stringstream ret;
00009     char q = '\'';
00010     ret << child("CRR_ID").data() << delim
00011         << q << child("CRR_Name").data() << q << delim
00012         << q << child("CRR_Pickup_Location").data() << q << delim
00013         << q << child("CRR_Phone_Number").data() << q;
00014     return ret.str();
00015  
00016 }
